item.title: Overwatch - Bastion Guide - Boo Boo Doo De Doo (Tips and Advice)
item.summary: This Bastion guide will show you how to effectively use him in both Scout and Sentry mode. He's all about constant repositioning. Don't forget the SURPRISE BASTION tactic too :p

item.title: Overwatch | Master Bastion - Tips and Tricks (ft KolorBlind)
Overwatch Coaching - Bastion - PLATINUM 2656 SR - [OverAnalyzed]
item.thumbnail: Overwatch coaching! Welcome to OverAnalyzed! In this series, we as a community help our fellow players with tips and advice on how to become better players!
